name: tri-pass
effect: Provides access to the first three Sevii Islands.
short_effect: Grants access to the first three Sevii Islands.

flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A pass for ferries
between ONE, TWO,
and THREE ISLAND.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A pass for ferries between ONE,
TWO, and THREE ISLAND.
It has a drawing of three islands.
